WatchedVideo.question: Have you watched the video at https://ide.crunchlabs.com/downloads?

GoWatchVideo.question: Please watch the video at https://ide.crunchlabs.com/downloads before proceeding.

OS.question: What Operating System do you use? (What type of computer)

Chromebook.question: Chromebooks are not officially supported. However, you can still use the Arduino Cloud if you are willing to figure things out yourself.

Linux.question: Request help in #ide-help-chat of the Hack Pack discord.

Other.question: Request help in #ide-help-chat of the Hack Pack discord.

Windows.question: If you click the up arrow near the wifi icon, do you see a white circle with the Hack Pack logo?

Mac.question: Do you see a white circle with the hack pack logo on the right side of the bar at the top of your screen?

WindowsInstallAgent.question: If you have already installed the create agent as in the video, you likely need to run it as administrator. Open windows search, type "Crunchlabs", right-click item ***without*** the word "setup", and click "Run As Administrator"

MacInstallAgent.question: Refer to the downloads video for how to install the create agent on mac. If you need additional help, ask in #ide-help-chat

BrowserCheck.question: Are you using Chrome as your browser, and have you disabled any content-blocking extensions?

ProvidedCableCheck.question: Are you using the provided USB-C to USB-A cable?

ArduinoPortCheck.question: Are you connecting the cable from your computer to the silver USB-C port on the microcontroller, ***not*** the black breadboard box?

Restart.question: Disable bluetooth on your computer and restart it. Windows users, start the agent as administrator again. Does it work now?

RequestHelpSupported.question: Request help in #ide-help-chat of the Hack Pack discord.
